message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid any complications.
Let's split it evenly, Alice.  This is the fairest way to start, and avoids any further complications.
Bob, my offer still stands. Let's wrap this up and avoid losing even more money.

Alice, I think it's time we started negotiating a bit more.  I'm offering you 40%, and I'm willing to go up to 50% if you're really adamant about it.  We can't keep rejecting each other's offers, or we'll both end up with nothing.
Bob, I'm compromising. 55-45 seems fair considering the time pressure.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
